nodes.text: Grossh was a Kaleesh male pirate who was the one of the leaders of the White Maw pirate organization during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3642 BBY, he and his White Maw minions engaged the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython, who was there to find the reactor, but they were all killed.
